main_topic.title: Is TPU allowed to be used in this competition
main_topic.content: Considering the huge data; we have, is allowed to train models on TPU?

comments.author: Muhammad Tariq Pervez
comments.content: Generally yes. But please read rules carefully

comments.author: Valentin Werner
comments.content: yes, you have TPU quota available, so you could use it to train.
